title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the philosophical AI assistant, including the types of arguments and theories it should handle, the desired level of analysis, and the expected user interactions.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components and their interactions, data flow, and integration with external services or knowledge bases. The architecture should ensure scalability, security, and efficient performance for our Philosophical AI Assistant. Additionally, consider the use of microservices and containerization technologies.

title: Develop Natural Language Processing (NLP) Module
description: Implement the NLP module to process and understand philosophical arguments and theories in natural language.

title: Develop Knowledge Base and Reasoning Engine
description: Create a knowledge base to store and organize philosophical concepts, theories, and arguments, and develop a reasoning engine to analyze and draw inferences from the knowledge base.

title: Design User Interface - Philosophical AI Assistant
description: Design the user interface for the philosophical AI assistant. This includes input methods (e.g., text, voice), output formats (e.g., text, visualizations), navigation, accessibility considerations (screen readers, color contrast, etc.), responsive design for various devices, and edge cases such as slow internet connections, limited screen space, and error handling. Consider the integration of real-time feedback and suggestions for users during their interaction with the assistant. Also, incorporate a feature to allow users to save and revisit their previous conversations. Include the following improvements: ensure the interface is intuitive and easy to navigate; explore the use of chatbot design principles for a more engaging user experience; and provide a clear and concise way for users to request help or support during their session.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Develop the user interface based on the approved design, integrating with the backend components.
dependencies: Develop Knowledge Base and Reasoning Engine

title: Set up Testing Framework
description: Establish a testing framework and write unit, integration, and end-to-end tests for the various components of the system.

title: Implement Security Measures for AsistenteFilosofiaIa
description: Identify potential security risks and implement appropriate measures to protect the system and user data. Ensure that the application follows best practices for secure coding, data encryption, user authentication, and authorization. Implement measures to prevent common web application vulnerabilities such as SQL injection, cross-site scripting (XSS), and cross-site request forgery (CSRF). Consider implementing secure communication protocols (e.g., HTTPS) and regular security audits. For the secure implementation of communication protocols, consider using well-established libraries or frameworks that support secure communication.

title: Set up Deployment and DevOps
description: Configure the deployment environment, set up continuous integration and delivery pipelines, and automate the deployment process.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, developer documentation, and maintenance manuals.
